Rule.name: JH_MR_DOB_LTCBI_VARCHAR
Rule.description: Copy of DOB_LTCBI rule but for varchar datatype

MaskingMapplet.name: DOB_varchar
MaskingMapplet.XmlData: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?><!DOCTYPE POWERMART SYSTEM "powrmart.dtd"><POWERMART CREATION_DATE="05/31/2017 02:09:28" REPOSITORY_VERSION="184.93"><REPOSITORY NAME ="OUTPUT_DOB" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Output Transformation" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="out_out_OUT_DOB" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="2000" SCALE ="0"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="INPUT" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Input Transformation" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="IN_DOB" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="EXPTRANS" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Expression" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="IN_DOB" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="IN_DOB" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT/OUTPUT" PRECISION ="29" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="substr(IN_DOB,1,10)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="DOB" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="substr(DOB,1,4)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="yy" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="4" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="substr(DOB,6,2)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="mm" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="2" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="substr(DOB,9,2)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="dd" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="2" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="TO_INTEGER(dd)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="dd1" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="TO_CHAR(DECODE(dd1,01,11,02,12,03,13,04,14,05,15,06,16,07,17,08,18,09,19,10,20,11,21,12,22,13,23,14,24,15,25,16,26,17,27,18,28,19,11,20,12,21,13,22,14,23,15,24,16,25,17,26,18,27,19,28,20,29,21,30,22,31,23,00,00))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="2" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="yy||'-'||mm||'-'||day" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="date_final" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="substr(IN_DOB,11,9)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="date_final1" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="9" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="date_final||date_final1" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="mask_date" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="29" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="mask_date" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="NEWFIELD" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="29" SCALE ="0"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Tracing Level" VALUE ="Normal"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="DOB_varchar" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="YES" TYPE ="IN_DOB" REF_INSTANCETYPE ="Input Transformation" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" MAPPLETGROUP ="OUTPUT_DOB" NAME ="out_out_OUT_DOB" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="29" REF_FIELD ="out_out_OUT_DOB" REF_INSTANCETYPE ="Output Transformation" SCALE ="0"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Is Active" VALUE ="NO"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Is Partitionable" VALUE ="NO"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Form Name" VALUE =""/> </TRANSFORMATION> <INSTANCE DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="OUTPUT_DOB" REUSABLE ="NO" TRANSFORMATION_TYPE ="Input Transformation" TYPE ="TRANSFORMATION"/> <INSTANCE DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="EXPTRANS" REUSABLE ="NO" TRANSFORMATION_NAME ="EXPTRANS" TRANSFORMATION_TYPE ="Expression" TYPE Transformation"/> <CONNECTOR FROMFIELD ="IN_DOB" FROMINSTANCE ="INPUT" FROMINSTANCETYPE ="Input Transformation" TOFIELD ="IN_DOB" TOINSTANCE ="EXPTRANS" TOINSTANCETYPE ="Expression"/> <ERPINFO/>
